homepage.visionStatementText: We strive to connect the world through personalized language learning. Above all, we value multicultural communication, friendship, and long-lasting relationships between students and teachers. We work to develop the best digital resources available and are committed to adjusting our lessons to fit students' goals. We also take feedback seriously and frequently update the website with requested features.

valueProp.tailoredLessonsText: Manabu teachers create personalized lesson plans that fit your learning styles and interests. Excercises and other materials are customized specifically for you.
valueProp.immersionText: We focus on getting students into a habit of constant learning. We are confident that we can help you immerse and achieve your fluency goals.
valueProp.dataAnalyticsText: Through Manabu, you can visualize your progress and growth. This can not only a way to stay motivated, but can also help you find areas of improvement.
valueProp.communityText: Learning a language can be difficult, so if you ever feel stuck we are happy to guide you! We have a supportive community of teachers and staff that will aid you throughout your studies.

homepage.beta: As a special thanks to beta testers, if you sign up now and purchase a lesson plan you will receive permanent free access to ALL premium features we release in the future. Happy learning!

error.name: You must input a name.
error.email: You must input a valid email address.

password.length: Your password must be at least 8 characters.

error.general: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem continues, please contact support@manabu.com or reach out on social media.

footer.aboutText: Minato Manabu (Pte. Ltd) is a startup focused on empowering people through education. Its headquarters are located in Singapore and the company strives to provide students with innovative learning tools and high quality lessons.
footer.copyright: Minato Manabu. 68 Circular Road, #02-01, 049422, Singapore. All Rights Reserved.

alerts.pastAppoint: You cannot make an appointment in the past.
alerts.unevenAppoint: Your appointments must be in 30 minute to 1 hour intervals.
alerts.badStart: You cannot start your appointments at that time (must be at the start of the hour or 30 minutes in)
alerts.shortAppoint: Your appointments must be at least 30 minutes.

modal.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the appointment?
modal.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this timeslot?
modal.processErr: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.

cancellationReason.uncomfortableStudent: I am uncomfortable with this student

disclaimerText.minuteBank: To give teachers time to prepare for their next student, lessons end 5 minutes early. However, after each lesson you will receive a 5 minute credit that you can use for that teacher. For example, if you buy 60 minute lessons, you will automatically get a "free" lesson after 12 lessons. The credits do not expire, but the extra lesson will expire when the plan expires.
disclaimerText.expiration: Lesson plans automatically expire 1 month after purchasing and unused lessons will not carryforward. If you choose the subscription option (coming soon) you will automatically receive a new lesson plan every month.

lessonTypes.mainichiDesc: This is for students who want to improve quickly and immerse themselves in speaking Japanese. With this plan, you will receive 22 personalized lessons every month or about 5 lessons every week.
lessonTypes.moderateDesc: This is for students who want a balanced but intensive learning schedule. With this plan, you will receive 12 personalized lessons every month or about 3 lessons every week.
lessonTypes.lightDesc: This is for students who want to casually practice Japanese. With this plan, you will receive 5 personalized lessons every month or about 1 lesson every week.
